header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: ah

yeah but I was in the taxi erm and I went to erm just go check my phone and it wasn't in my bag so I asked the taxi driver erm after he dropped me off to erm look under all of the seats and I had a look under the seats and I couldn't find anything and we opened up the boot and pushed the seats back and there was definitely nothing in there so erm then I messaged my mum who is just to let her know that the phone had been taken and erm my friends tried ringing it a few times and it just went straight through to voice mail which was strange because I had like sixty percent battery on it mm mm and we tried ringing it quite a few times and still erm nothing other than my voice mail erm my mum rang erm my mum rang the company and erm blocked the SIM card erm and then I imagine she contacted you erm and that was erm Saturday morning uhu erm and I I don't have the er find my Iphone activated on my phone but I could still erm put it to where it says a message the phone has been lost erm please ring this number with a contact number but obviously nobody's contacted nobody's used it erm nobody erm contacted me or anything with it so yeah erm and then just been waiting on a phone call from yourselves to sort out the insurance go into erm just to make sure that it definitely was the SIM card has definitely been blocked and I spoke to Apple support erm just to make sure that nobody could get into the phone without obviously erm putting it onto Itunes and restoring it to factory settings erm so that that yeah that's essentially what happened that's fine
alright okay I had to ring the police as well I did get a log number for it and I did that on Saturday morning
yeah no worries thank you I'm on hold
oh right do you reckon they're gonna pay out then?
I hope so I need a new phone I don't need a new phone I need an Iphone or a different phone with my SIM card on it you know
I mean like even though the blocked they can't they can't use it so there's nothing they can do with it except sell it aabroad
yeah they can restore it to factory settings erm but I mean if somebody starts using it like I said the IME whatever the fuck number has been reported to the police
right
so
that'll be blocked then they can't use it even if they restore it to factory settings they can get on to it but they can't use it as a phone they can use it as a fancy Ipod
mm
that's it there's noth they can't put a SIM card in and use it unless they're planning on taking it abroad or selling it abroad
yeah
so there's fuck all they can do about it I don't even know why people bother stealing them
I don't know why either
I've found five of them last year and I gave them all back because it's just pointless
yeah
even if it weren't pointless I wouldn't keep it because you don't know what's on there
yeah
you don't know if someone just died or
if somebody took your phone you'd be like
I'd be devastated
you'd be devastated so why wouldn't you
it's happened to me before
why wouldn't you just send it back to the person?
just have like it happened just after my dog had died just after my nan had died and I had all the last photos of me with them on that phone and someone stole it
yeah
and I can't get them back and that are the most devastating part
yeah like it's not really about the phone it's about the photos
it's not even the phone yeah cos I had insurance on the phone anyway
yeah
so
you should learn to back it up all the time
I back mine up once a month religiously
yeah

on the first of every month I back mine up and wipe my phone except for my messages I wipe all the pictures videos everything after I've loaded them onto my computer because otherwise my phone was slow
mm
so

what? they'll ring back so what are they saying? like as long as they're at arm's length they've got no reason not to pay out
I hope so I think it's just funny because I was out do you know what I mean
yeah because they'll so oh you were drunk you could have lost it or anything

yeah but I was hi sorry hi erm my phone went to call failed I was on I can't remember wh yeah I can't remember which individual bar it was erm I remember having it in erm and then erm I had it when I was walking to the next bar and then I had it in my bag and that was the last time that I remember having it erm it was an over the shoulder with a zip lock I keep it erm there's erm my my bag has a couple of sections in it and I always keep it in the closest section to my body and that has a zip across it over my shoulder I don't take my bag off yeah erm I left at maybe like a quarter past half past three I got in a taxi around half three erm from the taxi rank just outside no erm I looked in it to check the time when I got erm back to where I'm staying what man? hi sorry just seems like the signal's really bad on this phone that I have erm no unfortunately because it just it is it is just a taxi erm rank erm so any available taxi has just come I am yes erm I stay there erm during the term time and I go back erm maybe I usually go back about twice a month
